hero.title: About Trove
hero.description: We are dedicated to revolutionizing the investment landscape through innovative technology and exceptional user experiences.

company.title: About Our Company
company.description: Trove is a cutting-edge investment platform that combines advanced technology with user-centric design to provide seamless investment solutions. Our mission is to democratize access to sophisticated investment tools and make financial growth accessible to everyone.
company.placeholder: This section is reserved for detailed company information about Trove. Here you can explain your company's vision, mission, values, history, and what makes Trove unique in the investment technology space.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in investment technology.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in clear, honest communication and transparent business practices.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from product development to customer service.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make sophisticated investment tools accessible to everyone, regardless of their experience level.

pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your investment journey

hero.title: Investment Tools Pricing
hero.description: Unlock the power of professional trading with our comprehensive suite of investment tools. Choose from flexible plans designed for every type of investor.

packages.title: Choose Your Plan
packages.subtitle: All plans include our core features with varying levels of advanced tools

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from real investors who've transformed their trading

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.testimonial: Trove's tools have completely transformed how I manage portfolios. The analytics are incredibly detailed and the real-time data helps me make better decisions.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.testimonial: The professional plan gives me everything I need for day trading. The charting tools are superior to anything else I've used.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.testimonial: Our firm switched to Trove's enterprise solution and we've seen a 40% improvement in client satisfaction. The custom reporting is outstanding.

items.name: David Kim
items.testimonial: The algorithmic trading features in the premium plan have given us a significant edge. ROI improved by 25% in the first quarter.

performance.title: Proven Track Record
performance.subtitle: Our investment tools have consistently delivered results for thousands of investors

roi.title: Average ROI Improvement
roi.description: Users see average improvement in returns

stocks.title: Stock Trading Platform
stocks.description: Advanced tools for stock market analysis, real-time trading, and portfolio management with AI-powered insights.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Investment
realEstate.description: Discover lucrative real estate opportunities with comprehensive market analysis and investment tracking tools.

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency Trading
crypto.description: Navigate the crypto market with advanced charting tools, portfolio tracking, and automated trading strategies.
